It's just a good, basic first-person shooter. My only complaint: you can only use scopes on a few guns and on anything that doesn't have a scope, you cant aim through the sights. Other than that, good game, worth the low price.

Imagine enjoying a trash FPS where your bullets do not go where you aim. For that reason, every other FPS in existence > CSGO.
CSGO is a steadfast quality game despite its downfalls, i would recommend to anyone who enjoys first person shooters.
